bIsUndoRedoSwipeEnabled: Whether swiping left/right on touchpad/joystick triggers undo/redo
HandMeshComponent: Access to the current handmesh. Use ReplaceHandMeshComponent() to update the entire StaticMeshComponent.

methods.doc: @return Returns the type of HMD we're dealing with

methods.name: GetSlideDelta
methods.doc: Returns the slide delta for pushing and pulling objects. Needs to be implemented by derived classes (e.g. touchpad for vive controller or scrollweel for mouse )

methods.name: GetTrackpadPosition
methods.doc: Get the current position of the trackpad or analog stick

methods.doc: Gets if this interactor is hovering over UI

methods.doc: Check if the touchpad is currently touched

methods.name: ReplaceHandMeshComponent
methods.doc: Replace the default VR controller mesh with a custom one.

methods.doc: Next frame this will be used as color for the laser

methods.name: SetForceShowLaser
methods.doc: Set if we want to force to show the laser

methods.name: SetupComponent

methods.name: TryOverrideControllerType
methods.doc:
Temporary set what controller type this is for asymmetric control schemes.
You can't override the controller type when there's already an override.
Remove the temporary controller type with EControllerType::Unknown
@return true if the controller type was changed
